casebody.data:
AFSCME, Council 4, Local 1565 v. Department of Correction (13083)

O’Connell, Foti and La very, Js.

Argued January 4 decision released January 24, 1995 J. William Gagner, Jr., with whom, on the brief, was Harry B. Elliott, Jr., for the appellant (plaintiff). Robert A. Whitehead, assistant attorney general, with whom, on the brief, were Richard Blumenthal, attorney general, and Charles A. Overend, assistant attorney general, for the appellee (state). Per Curiam.

The judgment is affirmed.
